org.gjt.sp.jedit.browser
クラス VFSBrowser

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.gjt.sp.jedit.browser.VFSBrowser
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, EBComponent, DefaultFocusComponent, DockableWindow
public class VFSBrowser
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements EBComponent, DefaultFocusComponent, DockableWindow

The main class of the VFS browser. Used as dockable, and also embedded inside the VFSFileSelectorDialog.

バージョン:
$Id: VFSBrowser.java 23224 2013-09-30 20:51:42Z shlomy $
作成者:
Slava Pestov
関連項目:
直列化された形式

VFSBrowser

public VFSBrowser(View view,
                  java.lang.String position)
Creates a new VFS browser.

パラメータ:

VFSBrowser

public VFSBrowser(View view,
                  java.lang.String path,
                  int mode,
                  boolean multipleSelection,
                  java.lang.String position)
Creates a new VFS browser.

パラメータ:
view - The view to open buffers in by default
path - The path to display
mode - The browser mode
multipleSelection - True if multiple selection should be allowed
position - Where the browser is located
導入されたバージョン:
jEdit 4.2pre1

handleMessage

public void handleMessage(EBMessage msg)
インタフェース EBComponent の記述:
Handles a message sent on the EditBus. This method must specify the type of responses the plugin will have for various subclasses of the EBMessage class. Typically this is done with one or more if blocks that test whether the message is an instance of a derived message class in which the component has an interest. For example: 
 if(msg instanceof BufferUpdate) {
     // a buffer's state has changed!
 }
 else if(msg instanceof ViewUpdate) {
     // a view's state has changed!
 }
 // ... and so on

定義:
インタフェース EBComponent 内の handleMessage
パラメータ:
msg - The message

getFilenameFilter

@Deprecated
public java.lang.String getFilenameFilter()
推奨されていません。 Use getVFSFileFilter() instead. This method might return wrong information since jEdit 4.3pre6.

Returns the file name filter glob.

導入されたバージョン:
jEdit 3.2pre2
